title: CSHLData2023
text:
Arrival: June 29th by 6pm EST
Departure: July 13th around 12pm EST

title: CSHLData2023
text:
Arrival: June 29th by 6pm EST
Departure: July 13th around 12pm EST

title: CSHLData2023
text:
Teachers

Vincent Carey, Harvard Medical School
Sean Davis, University of Colorado Anschutz School of Medicine
Harmen Bussemaker, Columbia University
Leonardo Collado Torres, Lieber Institute for Brain Development
Ludwig Geistlinger, Harvard Medical School
Hans (Tomas) Rube, University of California
Min Zhang, University of California, Irvine
Shaoxun Liu, Columbia University
Daianna Glez
Renee Garcia Flores

title: References and Resources
text:
Resources


Orchestrating Single-Cell Analysis with Bioconductor

An online book and comprehensive guide to single-cell analysis with Bioconductor.



Orchestrating Spatially-Resolved Transcriptomics Analysis with Bioconductor

Ths online book is a bit more of a work-in-progress and presents a guide to spatially-resolved transcriptomics analysis with Bioconductor.



Workshop on Machine Learning in Genetics and Genomics

A series of five talks on machine learning in genetics and genomics from the National Human Genome Research Institute (2021).
